DOC.brief_title: HDCT and Stem Cell Transplantation for Mantle Cell and Relapsed Low Grade Non-hodgkin's Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: Low grade lymphoma patients receive R-ICE reinduction therapy followed by allogeneic stem cell transplanation if they have an HLA matched sibling, or an autologous transplant if they do not.
DOC.criteria: indolent histology lymphomas after relapse 1 or 2 LVEF > 50% Creatinine < 150 umol/L bilirubin < 30 umol/L wbc >3.5X10^9/L platelets >100X10^9/L other medical condition as controlled pregnant lactating HIV positive CNS involvement by lymphoma other malignancy
DOC.keyword: autologous and allogeneic stem cell transplantation
